body_html:
The change doesn't make it much worse: the padding= argument in the docstring already depends on the value in the code, and would have to be changed along with any changes in the function.

You could also omit the ... entirely, since it is irrelevant -- default args are used anyway, so not additional args need to be set.
body_text:
The change doesn't make it much worse: the padding= argument in the docstring already depends on the value in the code, and would have to be changed along with any changes in the function.
You could also omit the ... entirely, since it is irrelevant -- default args are used anyway, so not additional args need to be set.
body:
The change doesn't make it much worse: the `padding=` argument in the docstring already depends on the value in the code, and would have to be changed along with any changes in the function.

You could also omit the ... entirely, since it is irrelevant -- default args are used anyway, so not additional args need to be set.
